title: Not all carrot germplasm is the same -- in terms of salinity tolerance

title_detail.value: Not all carrot germplasm is the same -- in terms of salinity tolerance

summary: A study has evaluated the response of diverse carrot germplasm to salinity stress, identified salt-tolerant carrot germplasm that may be used by breeders, and defined appropriate screening criteria for assessing salt tolerance in germinating carrot seed.

summary_detail.value: A study has evaluated the response of diverse carrot germplasm to salinity stress, identified salt-tolerant carrot germplasm that may be used by breeders, and defined appropriate screening criteria for assessing salt tolerance in germinating carrot seed.
